selectAsLibs.sql: select * from com_valuuta l where (l.rekvId = $1 or l.rekvid is null)

select.sql: select l.id, l.rekvid, l.kood, l.nimetus, l.muud, l.status, l.library, $2::integer as userid, 'VALUUTA' as doc_type_id, l.tun1, l.tun4, l.tun5 from libs.library l where l.id = $1
select.sqlAsNew: select $1::integer as id , $2::integer as userid, 'VALUUTA' as doc_type_id, null::text as kood, null::integer as rekvid, null::text as nimetus, 'VALUUTA'::text as library, 0::integer as status, 0::integer as tun1, null::integer as tun4, null::integer as tun5, null::text as muud

select.sql: select $2::integer as userid, v.* from libs.valuuta v where v.parentId = $1

deleteDoc.sql: select error_code, result, error_message from libs.sp_delete_library($1::integer, $2::integer)

grid.sql: select id, kood, nimetus, $2::integer as userId from libs.library l where l.library = 'VALUUTA' and l.status <> 3 and (l.rekvId = $1 or l.rekvid is null)
